channel.title: How do you think this site is going?
channel.description:
Couple Quick Notes I allready know te nav bar images aint working ust wanted to see what you guys thought about the overall design?
Any feedback is welcomed and usually helpful tanks if you looked guys ;)
http://humanitygaming.webatu.com/Main.html
Made only 3 pages atm - homepage Members Contact Us
p.s sorry if the post doesnt look intresting at all lolz
Note: Site Is Only A Project Probly Gunna Release For Peeps To Use

item.title: How do you think this site is going?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I like the layout but the images are broken as stated earlier, plus, I found this. Don’t know if you knew this wasn’t down the whole page.

And also, the search bar/magnifying glass merges behind the main container when you scroll. I would keep the search bar fixed.

Final thing I would change, the black bar shown below is too dark, I would make it lighter so that it blends a bit better.

Other than those few things, the layout/colors are pretty nice.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you think this site is going?

I don’t like it because it’s not responsive.

item.title: How do you think this site is going?

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:2, topic:542092”]Well, the images are broken if anything.[/quote]This and I also think the container in the middle looks dumb. The style looks very 2000-esque.
